image-alt: U of I library with fall leaves
title: Welcome back!
paragraph: The library is open with new hours. Please check our Updates page for details.

image-alt: stylized aerial image of mountain and fields
title: GIS Day 2021 @ U of I
paragraph: Free hybrid event GIS Day: Mapping a Resilient Future takes place Wed Nov 17th. Call for Presentations is now open!

title: Native American Heritage Month
paragraph: Visit our display honoring Native American Heritage Month on the Library's first floor created in partnership with the Native American Student Center.

title: Chat help is available 24/7!
paragraph: Get help from a librarian 24 hours a day, 7 days week via chat--we'll help you find articles, books, and more!

title: Library Instruction
paragraph: Librarians offer instruction sessions on dozens of topics. Browse expertise and request a classroom session!

title: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Explore our new My Library stories highlighting students and little-known library services.
